comics.title: MY HEXSCHOOL
comics.description: If your banker breaks, you snap; if your apothecary by mistake sends you poison in your pills, you die.Therefore, I say, I saw that this situation of mine was the precise situation of every mortal that has this Siamese connexion with a plurality of other mortals.

detail.title: MY HEXSCHOOL
detail.description: If your banker breaks, you snap; if your apothecary by mistake sends you poison in your pills, you die.Therefore, I say, I saw that this situation of mine was the precise situation of every mortal that has this Siamese connexion with a plurality of other mortals.
detail.author: Namae Shiranai

chapters.text: Chapter 2: Todo List is Going Crazy!
